title: MD
biography: Henryk Skarzynski is a Polish doctor otolaryngologist, audiologist and phoniatrist, creator and director of Warsaw Institute of Physiology and Pathology of Hearing and World Hearing Center in Kajetany.
aiSummary: Henryk Skarżyński is a otolaryngology specialist with an H-index of 46 at World Hearing Center (Member). Has been published in JAMA Otolaryngology–Head & Neck Surgery, Medical Science Monitor. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
